mapper.select: SELECT USER_NAME , PHONE , ADDRESS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{ userNo }

SELECT P_NAME , P_OPTION_NO , P_COLOR , P_SIZE , P_STOCK , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , #{cartAmount} AS CARTAMOUNT , SELLER_CODE , A_NO , SELLER_NAME , IMG_NO , ROUTE , IMG_NAME , IMG_R_NAME , IMG_LEVEL , IMG_STATUS FROM PRODUCT_OPTION JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE USING(P_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING(IMG_NO) JOIN SELLER USING(SELLER_CODE) JOIN APPLY_STORE USING(A_NO) WHERE IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND P_OPTION_NO = #{ pOptionNo }
SELECT (SELECT SUM(POINT) FROM POINT WHERE POINT_CODE IN(1, 2, 4, 5) AND USER_NO = #{userNo}) - (SELECT SUM(POINT) FROM POINT WHERE POINT_CODE IN(3) AND USER_NO = #{userNo}) AS POINT FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_ORDER ( ORDER_CODE , USER_NO , ORDER_REQUEST , ORDER_CREATE_DATE , ORDER_DELIVERY , ORDER_ALL_PRICE , ORDER_MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_CODE.NEXTVAL , #{ userNo } , #{ postRequest } , SYSDATE , #{ postPrice } , #{ amount } , SYSDATE )

SELECT SEQ_ORDER_CODE.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ORDER_OPTION ( ORDER_OPTION_CODE , ORDER_CODE , P_OPTION_NO , ORDER_PRODUCT_NUM , ORDER_STATUS_CODE , ORDER_POSTNUM ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_OPTION_CODE.NEXTVAL , #{ cartNo } , #{ pOptionNo } , #{ cartAmount } , 'STATUS_CODE1' , NULL )

SELECT SEQ_ORDER_CODE.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO POINT ( POINT_NO , ORDER_CODE , POINT_CODE , POINT , POINT_DATE , USER_NO ) VALUES ( POINT_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ orderOptionCode } , 3 , #{ point } , SYSDATE , #{ userNo } )
